text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Did you think we thought you were stupid? We did!
Did you think we thought you were incompetent? We did.
Did we make fun of you? We did.
Even if we believed it was sarcasm... in a pandemic, that makes u a bigger moron
@vp
#COVIDー19
#coronavirus
#TrumpDisinfectant
